value.title: Rescale Raises $50 Million in Series C Funding

value.title: HappyFox applies conversational AI to support requests made via Slack
value.excerpt: HappyFox today announced it is using conversational AI to automatically resolve requests made to help or service desk platforms it supports via a Slack communications channel. Assist AI from HappyFox analyzes each request made via Slack to determine if a way to solve that issue already exists within an IT organization’s knowledge base.

value.title: PowerShot Pick uses AI to automatically capture photos and videos
value.excerpt: As it did with the Ivy Rec and PowerShot Zoom, Canon has launched a crowdfunding campaign to get an AI-powered camera called the PowerShot Pick into the hands of early adopters.

value.title: The iPhone's Face ID Will Soon Work With a Mask—If You Have an Apple Watch

value.title: Microsoft and the workplace of the future: How AI can help you build more productive relationships with your colleagues
value.excerpt: Microsoft wants to help organizations use their data to deliver experiences, insights and outcomes. But careful design, clear ethics and full transparency are required to keep the AI in check.

value.title: How Machine Learning Can Improve Our Email Experience
value.excerpt: Around 2015 or 2016, Google began a strategic move, possibly one of the most important it has undertaken in its more than 20 years of existence, to incorporate machine learning and apply it to all its products.

value.title: This Japanese AI Journaling App Helped Me Understand My Feelings
value.excerpt: As a self-proclaimed serial journal collector, Muute, billed as Japan’s first AI journaling app, was all too enticing for me. Much like a writing prompts journal, the app asks questions that encourage self-reflection.

value.title: ADVANCE.AI Launches 'Advance Intelligence Group' Parent Brand
value.excerpt: ADVANCE.AI, a homegrown AI and big data company in Asia helping to solve digital transformation, fraud prevention, and process automation for enterprise clients, is today formally announcing its corporate parent brand Advance Intelligence Group.

value.excerpt: Hello and welcome to our first “This month in AWS Machine Learning” of 2021! value.title: Get ready to roll! AWS DeepRacer pre-season racing is now open
value.excerpt: AWS DeepRacer allows you to get hands on with machine learning (ML) through a fully autonomous 1/18th scale race car driven by reinforcement learning, a 3D racing simulator on the AWS DeepRacer console, a global racing league, and hundreds of customer-initiated community races. value.title: Baidu green light to test driverless autonomous vehicles in California
value.excerpt: Baidu’s autonomous vehicles can now drive alongside those from Cruise, Waymo, Nuro, Zoox and AutoX in California. The Chinese company has just received approval to operate its autonomous driverless vehicles from the US state.

value.title: GDIT Announces AWS Availability on milCloud 2.0 Contract; Dave Levy Quoted
value.excerpt: General Dynamics Information Technology (GDIT) has announced the availability of Amazon Web Services (AWS) under the milCloud 2.0 contract, GDIT reported on Monday. AWS availability will provide the Department of Defense (DoD) access to an expanded portfolio of secure cloud services.

value.title: California to license driverless cars operated by artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: The California Department of Motor Vehicles has officially issued a permit to Baidu USA to begin testing driverless vehicles on public roads in Sunnyvale, California.

value.title: Artificial intelligence and the Gamestonk blowback
value.excerpt: Surrounded by rallies of “power to the people,” a rag-tag group of scrappy underdogs recently managed to bring Wall Street to its knees through a dazzling display of disobedient investing that saw Gamestop stocks rocket Moonward.

value.title: RPA startup UiPath raises $750 million
value.excerpt: Robotic process automation startup UiPath has raised $750 million in a series F round valuing the company at $35 billion.

value.title: iOS 14.5: Apple Just Revealed Brilliant New Face ID Feature
value.excerpt: The next version of iOS is coming soon, and today’s developer beta release lets slip a timely and important security feature.

value.title: The two companies have announced a significant 6-year partnership
value.excerpt: Google and Ford have inked a six-year partnership that will see the automaker using the tech giant’s expertise and products to bolster their cars and services.

value.title: Weights & Biases raises $45M for its machine learning tools
value.excerpt: Weights & Biases, a startup building tools for machine learning practitioners, is announcing that it’s raised $45 million in Series B funding. The company was founded by Lukas Biewald, Chris Van Pelt and Shawn Lewis — Biewald and Van Pelt previously founded CrowdFlower/Figure Eight
